name: Colourfull shawl
data: It decreases the users strength unnoticably.
It increases the users dexterity slightly.
It increases the users constitution unnoticably.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
